description:
Click on photo for full view.
Zanies® Monkey Business Squeaktaculars Dog Toys are made of soft plush with eight squeakers inside! The flat shape is great for shaking, tossing and tugging games. The limited amount of stuffing inside means less mess around the house.

name: *SALE*Dirty & Hairy PROTECT Green Tea & Lime Moisturizing Conditioner
description:
Follow up your doggie bath with a little conditioner. Even dirty dogs deserve great coats!
 
Great for making fur silky-smooth and helping repel fleas...naturally. 

Dirty & Hairy's conditioning rinse moisturizes short fur, and detangles longer hair. Made with top of the line ingredients naturally derived from vegetable oils, this conditioner has inherent moisturizing properties, to leave your dog luxuriously soft. The fresh-smelling formula leaves the coat shiny and soft while repelling bugs, ticks, and fleas. 

Features:
 • Naturally derived from vegetable oils
 • Competitive pricing for natural formulas
 • Infused with citronella to repel bugs and fleas...naturally!
 • No harsh detergents or artificial colors
 
Comes in a 16 oz flip top container, for easy pouring.
 
Scent: 
Citronella
 
Ingredients:
Water, Vegetable Derived Conditioner Base, Fragrance, Conditioning Agent, Preservative Mixture, Citric Acid, Citronella Oil.

name: **Isle of Dogs Lush Coating Conditioner** SALE Unbeatable price
description:
Unbeatable price!!! Add Shampoo & also save on shipping!
Isle of Dogs Everyday Violet & Sea Mist Lush Coating Conditioner for Dogs – 16.9 oz
**From the makers of Coature, the top-selling luxury grooming system for champions. **
After bathing with Clean Coating Shampoo, the next step to a fluffier, more plush-feeling coat is this rejuvenating, protein-based conditioner.  Evening Primrose and Jojoba oils combine with Keratin Amino Acids to help strengthen dry hair and lessen shedding. The results are a richer, fuller coat that is hydrated and fresh.

Features:
 • Boosts volume and fluff, moisturizes and nourishes the coat
 • Quick rinse performance
 • Herbal and natural extracts
 • Gentle and safe on both human and canine skin
 • Long-lasting freshness 
 • Fresh, crisp fragrance with  natural odor neutralizers and deodorizers  
 • Developed by experts to offer salon results at home



Made in the U.S.A.

options.name: Isle of Dogs Lush Coating Conditioner Alone
Add Red Berries & Champagne Clean Coating Shampoo and get this conditioner for 7.00

name: Puppy Cake Wheat-Free 4 flavors to chose from! Holidays are coming!
description:
Unlike cakes for people, Puppy Cakes are healthy and safe for your dog. Fed in moderation, Puppy Cake is a fun and healthy supplement to your dog's diet. We use rice flour for dogs with sensitive stomachs or allergies and evaporated cane juice to provide a nutritional snack. Top it with our yogurt frosting mix and you will be enhancing your dog's immune and digestive systems.
Comes with Frosting mix: unflavored yogurt powder dogs love!
Weight: 9 oz 
*Banana- Ingredients: whole wheat flour,  evaporated cane juice, baking powder, salt  and natural banana flavor
*Carob-Ingredients: whole wheat flour, evaporated cane juice, carob powder, baking powder and salt 
*Peanut butter- Ingredients: rice flour, evaporated cane juice, peanut flour, baking powder and salt.
Frosting mix: unflavored yogurt powder
*Red Velvet-Ingredients: rice flour, evaporated cane juice, beet powder, baking powder and salt.

name: Biker Dress/Harrness
description: Each dress has embroidered rose tattoo details and a skull & crossbones charm. Heavy duty stitching and metal hardware make these harnesses fashionable and functional. Velcro closure. In sizes: Teacups (dogs <2 lbs), XXS (dogs 2-5 lbs), XS (dogs 5-10 lbs), Sm (dogs 10-25 lbs).

name: Dog Hoodies
description:
Order Now! This product is on back order so may take about a week longer than normal delivery time. 
Casual Canine Puppy Pride Dog Hoodies
Help support the movement by choosing this comfortable Casual Canine® Puppy Pride Dog Hoodie that has rainbow ribbed knit accents and a rainbow puppy paw applique on the back. Made of cozy fleece poly/cotton with a high-cut, stay-dry belly.
Gift set available with matching collar, leash, ball and treats!! Contact me for order specifics. I will need your dogs size. Bulk shipping available!

name: Stroller - Sports XL - BLUE (pet up to 40 lb)

Stroller - Sports XL. BLUE, Hold Pet Up to 40lbs. 
* Removable parent/snack tray with cup holder and area for keys,  cell phone, and other small items
* Storage space for treats and toys 
* Machine washable padding and safety belt included

*Large mesh openings allow for excellent ventilation and visibility 
*Reflective stripes for night time safety 
* Convenient collapsing for storage and transport * Padded comfort handle
Stroller measurements: 16"W x 28"L x 39"H * Inside dimensions are: 22"L x 13"W x 23"H * 5.5" wheels with suspension * Rear brakes * Easy Assembly

name: Travel - Bed
description: Travel Bed with integrated, attached stuff sack allows for easy and portable travel. Super thick and dense inner is the best on the market, and will not bunch or deform in the washer. Microfiber top and nylon bottom are stain and water resistant. One size: 39" x 30

name: Carrier - Eva - PINK, 21x13x14
description: Can be used as a carrier, shoulder bag, backpack, trolley bag or car seat. This carrier is super light weight and waterproof. Top ventilation and visibility. Collapsible for easy storage.

name: Carrier - Cruising Bike Carrier - GREEN (pet up to 11 lb)
description:
2-in-1 design Can be used as a bicycle basket or a carrying bag. Reflective front for safety. Suitable for handlebars with a diameter of 22-26 mm. The basket has an interior leash to insure your pets safety. Top mesh canopy design to fully cover and protect the pet while the bicycle is moving. Padding for pet comfort. Securely attached with patented Adapter. Carrying belt with padded epaulet.
Dimension: (L x W x H) in inches: 14 x 13 x 10; Max load (lbs): 11; Product UPC: 4715243341303

name: Chalkboard Doorhangers
description: This is a MUST for those of us that are a little forgetful or need to leave reminders for others in the household. These have a chalk board surface (double sided). Jot down your pooches needs and hang it on the door so you see it on your way out: dog food, walk dog, wee-wee pads, Feed the dog, vet apt etc. 7.50+ 2.50 s/h

description:
Our New Puppy Basket gives you a mix of necessities and goodies.  It will come decoratively appointed, shrink wrapped and topped with a bow! These items will surely become your new puppies favorites!

Pup parent(s) will feel good knowing it’s: Certified organic fabric, Low eco impact dye process, Chemical free, Safe and certified non-toxic  -Retails alone between 20.00-35.00

name: Big Dog Good Dog Bucket
description:
This gift bucket is dedicated to Lucky. Lucky is a big dog in a family full of small dogs - little yappy small dogs that won't leave him in peace.  The little dogs get carriers, clothes and go to the groomer. What does Lucky get? A bone and a collar. Gee, thanks. Lucky deserves better. He likes a shampoo that doesn't dry out his skin and a big plush toy wouldn't hurt either. Here's to you, to all the Luckys out there. Enjoy your bucket.


Comes wrapped beautifully in clear cellaphane and a pretty bow.

name: Vet's Best Natural Ear Relief Wash & Dry *Save on shipping with Combo
description:
Use after your pet swims or is given a bath. Use regularly to keep ears clean, fresh, and dry. 

Gentle Ear Relief Wash and Dry products were formulated by a veterinarian to avoid the use of stinging alcohol and steroids to treat ear problems. The naturally soothing ingredients in Ear Relief Wash and Dry combine to provide fast relief when your pet's ears itch, smell, or appear to be raw, red, sore or greasy. Ear Relief Wash and Dry also helps prevent mites, ear scratching, painful "swimmer's ear" and wax buildup. Use after your pet swims or is given a bath. Use regularly to keep ears clean, fresh, and dry. 

All Natural Ingredients: 
Ear Relief Wash contains: yucca, aloe vera, chamomile, clove oil, tea tree oil, echinacea.

Ear Relief Dry contains: clove oil, aloe vera, tea tree oil, silica, chamomile, echinacea.

name: Vet's Best Ear Relief Wash™ -Chamomile & Yucca- Combo Offer available!
description:
-  Ear Relief WAS Chamomile & Yucca
-  Non-Stinging Alcohol- Free
-  Controls Odor & Itching
-  Soothes Raw, Red & Greasy Ears
Especially helpful for dogs with long ears. This formula soothes, cleans and eases scratching, redness and soreness due to waxy buildup and keeps the ear canal fresh. It also helps guard against swimmer's ear. Follow up in combination with Ear Relief DRY

options.name: Combine Ear Relief Wash & Dry & Save

name: Vet's Best Ear Relief Dry - Calendula & Clove - 4 fl oz
description:
Non-stinging, alcohol-free formula turns into an absorbent powder finish. This helps maintain the ear's normal pH balance to instantly control unpleasant odor. Also helps prevent scratching of ears, guards against waxy buildup and swimmer's ear.
*See "Ear Relief Wash" for special combo offer and save on product and shipping!*

name: *SPECIAL* Crazy Dog Baby Powder Shampoo with Add-on Grooming Spray option
description:
Crazy Dog Baby Powder Shampoo-
Formulated to clean, condition and moisturize all coat types. Contains panthenol (pro-vitamin B-5), which promotes long lasting moisturization, improves manageability, improves conditioning to a damaged coat and provides for a fuller and more luxurious shine. Extra natural coat conditioning is derived from wheat protein. Shipping weight: 1 lb.
****ADD grooming spray and save****
Crazy Dog Baby Powder scented grooming Spray-
 For puppies and dogs detangles, conditions, adds body and shine and reduces static. For grooming in-between baths it cleans and leaves a long lasting scent that will make your pet irresistible. Shipping weight: 3/4 lb.

name: Flea Away - 100 Chewable Tablets-Keep your pet safe the Natural way!
description:
Flea Away is a revolutionary natural product that will have your pet guarded from those annoying pests. It is a vitamin complex, specifically formulated for dogs and cats. Flavored with real liver -- pets love them!

Flea Away™ is a vitamin complex, specifically formulated for dogs and cats. Flavored with real liver -- your pet will love them!

When Flea Away™ is kept in your pet's system, the vitamins will cause your pet to develop a natural repellent for fleas, ticks and mosquitoes -- including the mosquito that carries the deadly West Nile virus.

What makes Flea Away™ different from alternate flea repellents is that fleas don't get on your dog or cat's skin and bite before finding chemicals and going away. They simply stay away from your pet because of the odor (undetected by humans), that your pet's skin gives off. With Flea Away™ the dog or cat's skin has a natural smell caused by the special safe mixture of vitamins that you and I can not smell, but fleas do.

Supplemental Facts:

Serving Size 1 Chewable Tablet

Amount Per Serving % Daily Value:

Thiamine 10mg 667%

Vitamin E 60 IU 200%

Niacin 40mg 200%

Vitamin B6 4 mg 200%

Folate 400 mcg 100%

Vitamin B12 12 mcg 200%

Calcium 200mg 20%

Brewers Yeast **

Liver Powder **

Collagen Powder **

**Daily Value (DV) not established.Other

Ingredients: Microcrystalline Cellulose, Silica, Vegetable Magnesium Stearate.

name: DOG PUP STAIRS 4-STEP - 14"W X 16"H for dogs up to 45lbs - CAMEL
description:
Description
Give your aging, arthritic or smaller dog 4 steps up to their favorite spot on the bed, couch or chair with the L.A. Dog Company Pup Stairs. Constructed of high density foam and professionally upholstered in lush mico velvet, L.A Dog Pup stairs will compliment any decor and ensure many years of use. Cover easily unzips for cold water machine wash and cool dry. 4-Step Pup Stairs measure 16" high x 14" wide. Available in Camel, Pecan and Espresso.

name: Skunk Odor Neutralizing Spray, 4 oz *SALE ITEM*
description: Dirty & Hairy's Skunk Odor Neutralizing Spray is an all natural odor counteractant containing naturally derived essential oils and organic compounds. The spray quickly and effectively neutralizes skunk odors and other foul smells by chemically altering the molecular structure of the malodor components making them less potent. Wash your dog with Skunk Odor Neutralizing Shampoo and that foul smell is washed down the drain. You can use the spray on any water-safe surface to remove unwanted odors.

name: Skunk Odor Neutralizing Shampoo. Keep on hand! *SALE ITEM*
description:
Oh No! Don't wait until you need it to order this one! Take advantage of special pricing and keep on hand, just in case. It will be worth it, if you do!
Open the cap and one whiff will tell you that this product is different! Skunk Odor Neutralizing Shampoo is formulated to work quickly and effectively to remove that awful smell from your unfortunate dog. Use together with our Odor Neutralizing Spray to give malodors a one two punch. This proprietary odor counteractant contains naturally derived essential oils and organic chemical compounds to effectively eliminate skunk odors and other foul smells leaving your dog smelling fresh and clean once again. Important Skunk Odor Neutralizing Shampoo is designed to be used AFTER Skunk Odor Neutralizing Spray. Do not use before. 16 oz

name: *SkyBox SkyBox Booster Seat - Khaki with Brown Details*
description: Instead put them in their very own plush space, where they can enjoy a nice window view; while tethered to the seat of course. In the front or in the back, your pup is just a safe reach away. You can focus a little more energy on the road with a little less cute puppy distraction. Mini Fido can enjoy his seat, riding in complete and comfy luxury while smiling at the other drivers. This is definitely a win-win for all parties involved! See below for more cool features and benefits. * Holds up to 30 lbs * Washable padded liner keeps seat fresh and clean * Metal supports for structural integrity * Collapsible for easy storage when not in use * Installs quickly and securely * Adjustable tether easily attaches to any dog harness and keeps them in their seat

name: Gulpy Jr. 10oz-a must have
description: Made for small breeds, the lightweight, packable Gulpy Jr. Portable water dispenser keeps Fido hydrated during outdoor adventures. Easy to use: squeeze bottle and water fills the tray, ready to be lapped up by one thirsty dog. 10 oz. water bottle nests in water tray when not in use; bottle will not leak when locked in tray. Belt clip on back; fits standard water bottle holder on bike.

name: OFF-LEASH - Smokey Beef, 6 oz
description:
Off-Leash Smokey Beef treats, by Buddy's Kitchen, are soft and chewy semi-moist treats for dogs.
 For any activity you share with your dog, you can promote good behavior by carrying Off-Leash treats with you. These mini treats are perfect for use in training and rewarding any dog, regardless of breed or size.

Off Leash treats are only 4 calories each, and feature quality, all natural ingredients. No corn, soy, artificial colors or flavors are added. Each treat measures approximately ½ inch in diameter.

Package Weighs 150g (5.29 oz)
All Natural, Smokey Beef Flavored Treats
Only 4 Calories Each

name: True Chews USA Chicken Jerky Fillets
description:
Made in the USA, True Chews® Chicken Jerky Fillets are an all natural, high protein treat your dog will love. Our American-sourced, American-made real chicken jerky fillets are rawhide-free and contain no fillers. They're a naturally delicious dog treat you can feel good about giving. Your dog will thank you!

100% American Sourced and 100% American Made

Slow-Roasted to Lock in Natural Flavor and Chewiness

100% Natural Odor Free Dog Chew

Rawhide-Free and No Fillers

All Beef Bully Individually Banded with UPC

name: Himalayan Dog Chew, Yaky Yam Lotsa Chicken, 4 oz
description:
Yaky Yam Strength contains additional protein to supplement your best friends' diet to help them:

To create new muscles for young dogs

To rebuild muscles for performance dogs

To produce milk for lactating mothers

To fulfill diet requirements for diabetic dogs

Ingredients: Yak & Cow Milk, Sweet Potato, Brown Rice flour, Chicken Powder, Chicken Broth, Salt and Lime Juice

Yaky Yam has the best of the both senses for the dogs. The strong smell of the smoked cheese and the sweet taste of the sweet potato not only ensure their complete enjoyment, but also gives them the best nutrition available.

name: Floppy Moppy's
description:
Soft mop-like yarns give this adorable ducky, pig, elephant or frog. An irresistibly squeezable feel. An internal squeaker makes the toy even more appealing for your pooch!!

The Floppy Moppy toys measure approximately 7 inches long and is suited for dogs that are known for their gentle play with soft toys.

name: Arfy Woofhall Lithograph Toy
description:
LIMITED SUPPLY and difficult to find! For the pet with the artsy type parent(s). Toy has a squeaker inside, and is parodied after Andy Warhol's creation featuring Campbell's soup cans. The soup cans are replaced, of course, with cans of dog food! Not your average toy, for your not so average pooch!

Toy measures 7" x 5". Machine washable on delicate cycle.

Makes a great pillow for sleep-time. You may also like the Vincent Van Dog toy.

name: Vincent Van Dog Painting Toy
description:
For all you pooches with artsy type pet moms or dads. This toy parodies the famous Starry Night painting by legendary post-Impressionist artist Vincent Van Gogh. It has a squeaker inside your dog will love! 

Toy measures 7" x 5". Machine washable on delicate cycle.

Makes a great pillow for sleep-time. You may also like the Arfy Woofhall Lithograph toy.

name: Lolly Lamb Organic Puppy Blanket-
description:
This comes with a super cute Simply Fido™ character built right in for puppy playtime. 2 for 1, blankie and toy! Keeps your puppy cozy and secure with the Simply Fido™ plush organic cotton blanket. This blanket is ideal for small breed dogs and for welcoming your new large-breed pup into your home.
 
No worries it's organic!
From the SimplyFido™ Blanket Collection. Simply Fido™ Organic Blankets are made of organic fabrics and all-natural dyes. Organically grown, the fibers in each toy are unbleached, untreated, and unprocessed.  The colors come from nature:  beige from a chestnut bur, yellow from a gardenia seed, red from the madder root, and grey from mineral charcoal.  

Blanket measures 20” x 20”.

name: Lolly Lamb Organic Rope Toy
description:
Organic plush rope toy from the Simply Fido™ Collection. Made with Certified organic cotton and natural dyes. Filled with natural cotton and squeaker inside. 
 
Features:
Low Eco Impact dye process 
Chemical free 
Environmentally safe 
Safe and certified non-toxic 

Measures 7".

name: Guardian Gear Aquatic Pet Preservers
description: Help to keep your best friend SAFE! Guardian Gear® Aquatic Pet Preservers are high quality dog life jackets that are great for keeping pets safe in and around the water. Each pet preserver is made with two layers of flotation material and features quick grab handles for easy water rescues.

name: Guardian Gear Safety Vests for Dogs
description: Safety first! Our bright and reflective Guardian Gear® Safety Vests help keep pets safe by increasing their visibility during outdoor activities. Ideal for nighttime walks and exercise sessions.

name: Lil' Monster Hoodies
description:
Casual Canine Lil' Monster Hoodies!
ZM3478Now every dog can be a Lil' Monster with our Casual Canine® Dog Hoodies. These hilarious hoodies have a distinctive design that allows the hood to snap securely in place, letting everyone see the monster face even when the hood isn't in use.

Note:  If the dog has a stout build, select one size larger.
Recommended sizing by breed:

XX-Small: Teacup and dogs under 5 lbs
X-Small: Australian Terrier, Chihuahua, Pomeranian, Toy Poodle, Yorkshire Terrier
Small: Boston Terrier, Jack Russell Terrier, Maltese, Pug, Silky Terrier
Medium: Bichon Frise, Beagle, Cocker Spaniel, Corgi, Scottish Terrier
Large: Brittany Spaniel, Bulldog, Collie, Schnauzer, Springer Spaniel
X-Large: Doberman Pinscher, German Shepherd, Golden Retriever, Labrador Retriever, Rottweiler

name: Vet's Best Natural Flea & Tick Spray
description:
Avoid using poisons to treat your beloved four legged buddy. "The toxins that are used to kill fleas are also harmful to the animal" .  Naturally say goodbye to fleas and ticks. This unique natural blend of peppermint oil and clove oil extract (eugenol) stops them in their tiny tracks. With Peppermint Oil and Clove Extract it kills fleas, flea eggs, ticks and mosquitoes on contact naturally.
Contains no pyrethrins or cedar oil. Plus it soothes skin to leave pets comfortable and smelling fresh as can be.  
8 oz.
*We also offer pet shampoos that use ingredients that naturally repel insects.

name: Itchin' for Relief - Anti-Itch Spray
description:
Relief right where you need it! Happy Tails' unique "nozzler" spray gets this soothing formula through the fur directly to itchy and irritated skin. No muss, no fuss, no wet dog or wasted product. Every drop of this all-natural product by-passes even the thickest coat and attacks the problem at the source. 

Eases the discomfort of itchy skin caused by minor irritations and insect bites 
Helps relieve hot spots 
Combats inflammation
Has powerful antioxidant-like properties

Itchin' for Relief contains a blend of Neem, Oat Extract, Litchi and Aloe to soothe irritated skin while Boswellia Serrata & Calendula help to reduce inflammation. Also included is Grapefruit Seed Extract to prevent both bacterial and fungal infections.

name: KissAble Toothbrush/Toothpaste Combo
description:
Cain and Able KissAble Toothbrush and Toothpaste Set help your dog ward of bad breath, gum disease, multiple infections, and heart disease by consistently brushing dogs teeth. The unique design of the KissAble toothbrush makes it easy to clean all three sides of the tooth with one stroke and the soft bristles massage the gums while the firmer bristles clean teeth. The vanilla flavored toothpaste is all natural and is great for dogs and their people. 

Cain and Able Kiss Able Toothbrush and Toothpaste Set Includes: - 1 Cain and Able Kiss Able Toothbrush- 1 Cain and Able Kiss Able Toothpaste.

name: Puppia Soft Dog Harness
description:
Puppia Soft Dog Harness Mesh - The Original and Best Selling Soft Harness in the World!

The Puppia soft dog harness is made of a soft air-mesh material which is very comfortable on your dogs neck. It can be sized with its re-sizable chest belt to fit comfortably on your dog. Easy snap on and off. The Puppia soft dog harness is a real winner for comfort. **Coordinates with Puppia Two Tone Dog Leash, sold separately.

Size Chart: XS Neck 8.27";Chest 11.22-15.35" / Small Neck 10.63";Chest 12.8-17.72" / Medium Neck 12.99";Chest 14.96-20.67" / Large Neck 14.96";Chest 19.69-27.56" / XL Neck 16.54";Chest 22.44-31.5" / XXL Neck 19.67";Chest 28.3-40.16"

name: Puppia Matching Lead-Available in Toy sizes!
description:
This is the matching lead/leash to the Puppia Soft Harness. They are made of polyester and feature a nickel plated D-ring and an authentic Puppia rubber label. 

These leashes are available in three different sizes:

Small:45" long and 1/3" wide. Only suggested for tiny dogs under 5 pounds. 
Medium: 47" long and 1/2" wide. Suggested for dogs under 11 pounds or for leash training larger dogs or puppies.
Large: 57" long and 3/4" wide. Suggested for dogs over 11 pounds.

Colors:
Beige, Purple, Sky Blue, Royal Blue, Black, Red, Orange, Yellow, Pink & Green

Pink matches any of the Pink Puppia harnesses. Sky Blue matches any of the Sky Blue Puppia harnesses. Black matches the Camo harness and any of the Puppia harnesses trimmed in black. All other solid colors match the same color harness.

name: Urban Hund Leather Collar
description:
The Urban Hund Collar - Classic Chocolate Central is your classic leather collar with an urban touch. Soft, supple leather is double stitched and has contrasting layers. 

2 color choices: Red/Navy and Chocolate/Lt. Blue. XXXXS: (6-10") XXXS: (8-12") XXS: (10-14") XS: (12-16") S: (14-18") M: (16-20") L: (18-22") XL: (20-24") 

XXXXS -XS collars are 1/2" wide Small, Medium collars are 3/4" wide Large, XL collars are 1" wide.

name: Urban Hund Central Leather Leash
description:
Your dog should be as stylish as you are. 


Matches with the Urban Hund Central Leather Collar.

Select from the following sizes:

Small - .5"
Medium - .75"
Large - 1"

All leads are 5' long.

name: SPOTLit - LED Collar Light and Safety Flasher - Blue
description:
Always be able to spot your pooch! 
Nite Ize SpotLit The battery-powered LED emits a bright ambient glow (up to 1000 feet). Two modes are simple to activate—press once for a steady glow, twice for continuous flash. SpotLit features a durable stainless steel carabiner clip and easily replaceable batteries.

name: SPOTLit LED Collar Light and Safety Flasher
description:
Nite Ize SpotLit LED Pet Light is a clip-on safety light for you and your dog. Water resistant. Flash or glow modes. Long life replaceable batteries included. 1.25"W x 2H x .75D.

Available in red or white.

name: Avant Garde Retractable Leash
description:
Make a statement with the Avant Garde Retractable Dog Lead. 
This retractable nylon belt lead features a high impact plastic case, comfort rubber grip, metal swivel hardware and one button operation. Lightweight, stylish and full of personality, it makes walking the dog that much more fun. 

Features: Super stylish Tough plastic case
Lightweight nylon belt lead 
Comfort grip for easy carrying 
One button operation 
Durable hardware

Size: Small 9 feet, holds up to 14 lbs. Medium 15 feet, holds up to 28 lbs

Manufacturer: 26 Bars and a Band

name: Avant Garde Dog Harness
description:
The Avant Garde Harness is available as the perfect compliment to your Avant Garde Leash. Convenient Velcro makes it easy to adjust to the right size for your dog or gives room to grow for your puppy. Harnesses reduce stress allowing weight to be distributed evenly through the chest and shoulders when your dog pulls during walking.

It is made of lightweight "soft shell" that is machine washable.  Has an easy to use hook and loop fastener on belt and adjustable neck. Harness has heavy duty stitching for lasting quality and a metal D-ring for attaching identification tags and a leash. 

Manufacturer: 26 Bars & a Band

Available in four sizes:

                         Length,           Girth,             Neck

name: Wet Noses Organic Pumpkin Treats
description:
It's pumpkin time of year again!!! Wet Noses all natural certified USDA Organic dog treats are made with human grade ingredients in a U.S. facility and are the perfect addition to your treat cupboard. Using wholesome, roasted pumpkin and organic flours, this treat smells great and is loved by even the most finicky dog. Holistic vets recommend pumpkin for its soothing effect on the digestive system. 

Plus, these special treats contain no corn, wheat, soy, chemicals, preservatives, animal by-products or dairy. 

Ingredients: organic rye flour, organic oat flour, organic roasted pumpkin, organic canola oil, organic ginger, organic cinnamon.

Guaranteed analysis:  crude protein 6% min., crude fat 9% min., crude fiber 5% max. moisture 5% max. Calories per treat: 29

14 oz.
Packaging contains post consumer recycled material.

100% ORGANIC  VEGAN  NO CORN  NO SOY  NO WHEAT

name: Wet Noses Organic Dogranola Treats
description:
Did You Know? Flax seed plays a significant role in canine cardiovascular health as well as skin and coat health. Flax seed is an important source of fiber and antioxidants, and it may have anti-tumor properties in addition to it’s other health benefits.

description:
Wet Noses Washington Apples & Carrots treats are the perfect pairing of organic apples and organic carrots! Apples and Carrots are both filled with beta carotene and vitamin A which have been linked to an improved function of the immune system.

Plus, these special treats contain no corn, wheat, soy, chemicals, preservatives, animal by-products or dairy.

description:
Did You Know? Sweet potato has a soothing effect on the stomach and intestines. The vitamins (B-complex and C), beta carotene, potassium and calcium are very effective in reducing the pain and inflammation of ulcers.
 
Ingredients:

name: Wagatha's Organic Coconut Grove Treats
description:
Wagatha's Coconut Grove treats are certified organic dog biscuits with a great taste your pup will love. These treats are wheat-free and made from the finest holistic ingredients to support skin and coat health. 

Ingredients: 
Human Grade Certified Organic Ingredients: Whole Oat flour, whole barley flour, canola oil, cooked apples, dried cherries, dried coconut, cracked flax seed, coconut paste, cherry juice concentrate, rosemary oil. 

Wagatha Little Bites are available in P. Nutty Banana and Coconut Grove flavors. They come in a 8 oz. bag.

name: Wagatha's Organic Peanutty Banana Treats
description:
Wagatha's Peanutty Banana are certified organic dog biscuits with a great taste your pup will love. These treats are wheat-free and made from the finest holistic ingredients to support skin and coat health. 

Ingredients:
Human Grade Certified Organic Ingredients: Whole Oat flour, whole barley flour, canola oil, cooked apples, roasted peanut flour, bananas, chopped peanuts, cracked flax seed, rosemary oil. 

Wagatha Little Bites are available in P. Nutty Banana and Coconut Grove flavors. They come in a 8 oz. bag.

name: Rescue Remedy Natural Stress Relief
description:
Natural Stress Relief for Pets
 
For years, Rescue Remedy has been recommended by veterinarians for animals worldwide as an emergency remedy to help calm pets in all kinds of stressful situations. This alcohol-free formulation is suitable for use with all animals, including dogs, cats horses and birds.

Simply place 4 drops of Rescue Remedy Pet directly into the mouth. Alternatively, add 4 drops to food, water bowl or on a treat. Rescue Remedy Pet can also be rubbed directly on the animal's nose, ear or paw. Choose the method easiest for you that will ensure the animal receives the correct dosage. 

For a calmer animal, try Rescue Remedy to restore emotional balance whenever your pet is under pressure. Appropriate usage times include:

Visits to the vet or groomer
Stress caused by loud noises
Excessive barking or hissing caused by stress
After a shock, a fright or mistreatment
Any emotional crisis

name: Angels' Eyes Tear-Stain Eliminator for Dogs
description:
•Eliminates unsightly tearstains from the inside out
•Helps to eliminate staining around the mouth and coat due to licking
•Starts working before the tear stains begin
•Safe for your pet, no harmful dyes
•Very palatable chicken flavored powder can be added to food or water

Simply sprinkle daily on the pet food; after three months, reduce it to four times a week; after six months, reduce it further to twice a week. The pet's coat should be completely tear-stain free anywhere from three to five weeks. 

Puppies (up to 3 months): 1/8 tsp. daily, Dogs 8 to 12 lbs: 3/4 tsp. daily, Dogs 2 to 5 lbs: 1/4 tsp. daily,  Dogs 12 lbs & up: 1 tsp. daily, Dogs 5 to 8 lbs: 1/2 tsp. daily. 

Angel Eyes is safe during pregnancy and for puppies over 6 weeks old. For those pets who have allergies to beef, this is a special chicken formula.

Size: 30 grams

name: Canine Earth Odor Control Vanilla Citrus Natural Dog Shampoo
description:
Wash and Wag! Vanilla Citrus Odor Control Shampoo provides a fragrant and foamy bath time experience and contains certified organic ingredients with aromatherapy and probiotic benefits. Probiotics provide a barrier against allergens, free radicals, and pollutants in the air, making this shampoo an excellent skin therapy.

Orange peel oil and lemon extract naturally deodorize. This product is eco-friendly, hypoallergenic, pH balanced for dogs, and Verified Natural...your guarantee of truly natural products made in the USA.
Canine Earth Naturals are verified natural which is your guarantee of truly natural products. The same way human skin can be negatively affected by soaps with high pH and chemical ingredients, the same problems can affect your pet. It contains aroma-therapeutic with organic ingredients and PROBIOTICS to provide a barrier against harmful pollutants, free radicals and allergens.  Gentle and safe, formulated and pH balanced for canine skin and coat. 

Sulfate, Paraben, and Soap free!
Biodegradable  & Biocompatible
Cruelty Free
16oz

name: Canine Earth Furry and Fresh! Deodorizing Spray
description:
Is your dog an Earth Dog? Great! Does she smell like one? Not so great.

Furry and Fresh Clean Essence Deodorizing Spray is a quick fix to freshen up a dog between baths. Light, clean essence eliminates odor, restores shine, and nourishes skin and coat. It also provides aromatherapy and probiotic benefits.

Probiotics provide a barrier against many harmful substances including pollutants, free radicals, and allergens. Healthier skin and coat means happier pup! 

This product contains organic ingredients and is hypoallergenic, pH balanced for dog’s skin, and is a Verified Natural Product. 

8 oz


Made in the U.S.A.

name: Canine Earth Doggie Detangle Moisturizing Oatmeal & Aloe Conditioner
description:
Canine Earth's natural products are aroma-therapeutic with organic ingredients and probiotics to provide a barrier against harmful substances including pollutants, free radicals, and allergens.

Doggie Detangle Moisturizing Oatmeal & Aloe Conditioner contains aloe, colloidal oatmeal, and omega fatty acids to detangle, restore shine to coat, and calm skin. It also provides aromatherapy and probiotic benefits. Probiotics provide a barrier against many harmful substances including pollutants, free radicals, and allergens. Healthier skin and coat means happier pup! This product contains organic ingredients and is hypoallergenic, pH balanced for dog’s skin, and is a Verified Natural Product. Does not contain sulfates or parabens. 

Biodegradable & Biocompatible
Cruelty Free
16 oz.

name: Canine Earth Wash and Wag! Tear Free Ultra Gentle Puppy Shampoo
description:
Canine Earth's Wash and Wag! Tear Free Ultra Gentle Puppy Shampoo is formulated to be extra gentle and safe for puppy's delicate skin. It helps protect your pet's skin from allergens, free radicals and pollutants. Being hypoallergenic in nature, this shampoo is extremely mild for your pet. 

Made specially for: Puppies

Free of: Petrochemicals, sulfates, parabens, artificial colors and fragrances

Size: 16 oz

name: Canine Earth Awesome Apple Paw Balm
description:
Awesome Apple Paw Balm moisturizes, protects, and heals with shea butter and vitamin E to get Rover running on all fours again. 

Awesome Apple Paw Balm blends certified organic and intensely healing Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Jojoba Oil and Vitamin E to treat rough, sore, cracked or dry pads and paws. It is also great for moisturizing elbow calluses and dry doggy noses. Apply to dogs paws after exposure to road salt, snow, hot sidewalks or anytime dry skin occurs. Canine Earth's Awesome Apple Paw Balm is made from all natural ingredients so it's safe for dogs to lick.

USDA Certified Organic & Cruelty Free
Biodegradable & Biocompatible

14g tin


Made in the U.S.A.

name: Dirty & Hairy PROTECT Natural Spray
description:
Does your dog like to run through the mud, frolic in ditches and root through debris? If so, use Dirty & Harry's refreshing spray between adventures to keep your dog smelling fresh while protecting against bugs, ticks and fleas without the use of pyrethrin-based pesticides. 

The spray contains a proprietary odor-eater ingredient that neutralizes odors to keep your pet and house odor-free. You can also spray on bedding, carpets, and upholstery. The natural human grade ingredients are safe for people, puppies, and other pets. Use in conjunction with Dirty and Hairy's Shampoo for a pest-free pet.

4 oz.

name: Dirty & Hairy PROTECT Natural Shampoo - Green Tea & Lime
description:
When a mere hose-down isn't going to remedy the muddy mess.

For a sudden impact that will wash away the grime with magnum force, yet be gentle on your dog's skin.
A MUST for outdoor or active dog!
Naturally repels insects. 
Take advantage of our Super Saver Deal and add Dirty & Hairy Protect Natural Conditioner for 5.50! An incredible savings! 

Product Description:
Infused with citronella, Dirty and Hairy's shampoo will cleanse and condition your dog while naturally repelling bugs, ticks and fleas without the use of pyrethrin-based pesticides. 

Made with a mild, puppy-safe coconut base, Dirty & Hairy's gentle cleansing agents remove dirt and grime without stripping your pet's skin of natural oils. It will not wash out spot-on flea and tick control products. There are no harsh detergents or artificial colors. And the natural, human-grade ingredients are **safe for people, puppies and other pets**. 

Available in a 16oz flip top container, for easy pouring.

name: Isle of Dogs Clean Coating Shampoo *SALE*
description:
Trusted by dog owners tough on dirt and kind to their loved pets.

Made in the U.S.A.

Isle of Dogs Red Berries Champagne Clean Coating Dog Shampoo for Dirty, Filthy and Smelly Dogs - 16.9oz 

**From the makers of Coature, the top-selling luxury grooming system for champions. **

Features: 
 • Contains herbal and natural extracts
 • Gentle and safe on both human and canine skin
 • Long-lasting freshness 
 •Fresh crisp fragrances with natural odor neutralizers and deodorizers 
 • Developed by experts to offer salon results at home

Green Tea Extract, Aloe Leaf Juice and Witch Hazel Extract combine to deodorize and freshen the coat. A gentle, yet thorough, cleansing shampoo that removes dirt, grime and odor, and extends time between baths.

Follow with Everyday Isle of Dogs Lush Coating Conditioner.

name: Isle of Dogs Repláscent
description:
Isle of Dogs Everyday - Repláscent - Violet + Sea Mist - 5 oz

Featuring ExtenScent - a natural odor-neutralizing complex that extends freshness.

A revolutionary odor-neutralizing spray for your dog and home. Repláscents replace scent, neutralizing bad odors and replacing them with a subtle delicious fragrance. An alternative to perfume and home sprays which are not safe for application directly on your dog.

Made in the U.S.A.

name: Royal Stripe City Buggy- Red or Blue
description:
Description
Light Stroller frame Front wheels turn 360 degrees Easy to fold and store flat Water repellent and anti grasp inner cushion Holds up to 45 lbs

name: Stroller - Mochi Pet Carrier/Stroller - 2 in 1- PINK
description:
Don't be fooled by imitations! 
Space saving for transportation, with Eco-friendly design when folded. Carrier bag with side pockets. Double 360 turning front wheels, and rear safety breaks. Easy to fold and store flat. Carrier bag can be separated to use as shoulder carrier or car seat. Snack tray with dual cup holders and ample storage basket for treats.

name: Hemp Dog Carrier/Messenger Bag
description:
Ok Fido, try and chew through this one. I dare ya!


These carriers are made with hemp - Go Green! Protecting the world one dog at a time™. Available in Small and Large.

Made with a durable hemp canvas outer shell
UV mesh panels for UV protection
Exterior water bottle pocket, cell phone and keys pocket
Washable fleece covered pad for comfort and ease of cleaning. 

The top of the carrier zips, and there's also a tether inside for your dog's collar or harness.

A mesh water bottle pocket is on one short side. There's also a zipper pocket on one long side for your keys and a cell phone.

The Small size (for dogs up to 10 pounds) measures about 12 inches wide, 5 inches deep and 9 1/2 inches tall. Product weight 1.85 pound.

The Large size (for dogs up to 25 pounds) measures about 15 inches wide, 7 inches deep and 13 inches tall. Product weight 2.30 pound.

Retail Price: $190 asking 25.00-75.00 depending on amount of damage. Non-damaged bags are 170.00.
Rock & Republic Small Fuschia & Black Dog Carrier Precious Cargo Collection 

The Rock & Republic is the perfect carrier for your small dog. Make sure your Maltese, Yorkie, Pomeranian or other small breed dog is carried in as much style as she deserves. The ideal size for this carrier will be a dog between 5 and 9 pounds

name: Booster Seat - Holds up to 30 lbs. - Black with Orange Details
description:
Ride in Luxury With a Sky Box View! Want to give your pooch a comfortable and enjoyable ride? The Skybox Booster Seat offers a safe and secure alternative by providing enough elevation for small dogs to have a clear view of the road ahead and a comfortable, secure padded seat to snuggle down on longer trips. The best part is that your pup is still within arm's reach for a much-needed belly scratch!

Features & Specifications: Easy installation â€¢ Side zipper pocket for storage measures 12"x5" â€¢ 2 front slit pockets are great for treats, or pick-up baggies â€¢ Exterior fabric is 600d Polyester â€¢ Removable liner is 1/2" thick - quilted with fleece on one side & denier Polyester on other & machine washable â€¢ Adjustable safety strap w/ swivel clasp expands to 7" long â€¢ Metal supports for structural integrity â€¢ Collapsible for easy storage when not in use. Inside dimensions: 15"W x 12.5"D x 8"H, Exterior dimensions: 16"W x 13"D x 9"H, Collapsed: 16"W x 13"D x 2"H, Color: Black with Orange details, Weight: holds up to 30 lbs, we recommend dogs be no larger than 15 lbs to comfortably be able to fit and have room to lay down. Note: After clipping skybox tether strap to a dog harness adjust the length of the strap to keep dog from jumping out. Always use a harness with the skybox, collars are not suitable for automotive restraint. Never leave a dog unattended in the vehicle.
